item.title: 美国 通胀警戒下的单边行情
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 欧佩克坚持石油需求观点，认为经济有潜在上升空间
item.description: 欧佩克周二坚持其对2024年全球石油需求相对强劲增长的预测，并表示今年世界经济有可能好于预期。【原文：OPEC stuck to its forecast for relatively strong growth in global oil demand in 2024 on Tuesday and said there was a chance the world economy could do better than expected this year.】

item.title: 家得宝季度可比销售额降幅大于预期
item.description: 本周二，家得宝公布的季度同店销售额降幅大于预期，原因是谨慎的房主减少了大件商品的购买，而将重点放在了小规模维修上。【原文：Home Depot posted a bigger-than-expected drop in quarterly same-store sales on Tuesday as cautious homeowners shelled out less for big-ticket purchases while focusing on small-scale repairs.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表建议提高关税以应对中国的 "不公平 "做法
item.description: 美国贸易代表凯瑟琳-戴周二建议提高对一系列中国商品的关税，称需要采取更多行动来解决中国的技术转让政策和做法对美国工人和公司造成的损害。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Tuesday recommended raising tariffs on a range of Chinese goods, saying additional actions were needed to address China's technology transfer policies and practices that harmed U.S. workers and companies.】

item.title: 美国 4 月小型企业景气指数回升
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，4月份美国小企业信心增强，计划提价的企业主比例为一年来最小，但持续的劳动力短缺继续给企业主带来成本压力。【原文：U.S. small-business confidence increased in April and the share of owners planning to raise prices was the smallest in a year, but persistent labor shortages continued to exert cost pressures for owners, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 拜登对中国商品征收的新关税是什么？
item.description: 乔-拜登总统将对 180 亿美元的中国商品加征关税，包括电动汽车、电池、半导体、钢铁、铝、关键矿产、太阳能电池、船岸起重机和医疗产品，同时保留特朗普时代对超过 3000 亿美元商品加征的关税。【原文：President Joe Biden is hiking tariffs on $18 billion in Chinese goods including electric vehicles, batteries, semiconductors, steel, aluminum, critical minerals, solar cells, ship-to-shore cranes, and medical products, while retaining Trump-era tariffs on over $300 billion in goods.】

item.title: GameStop 和 AMC 大涨唤起了 2021 年备忘录股票传奇
item.description: GameStop 和 AMC 的股价在周二的盘前交易中分别大涨近 40%，有望延续一天前的涨势，当时 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "发布的一系列帖子重新点燃了涨势，让人联想起漫画股的交易狂潮。【原文：Shares of GameStop and AMC jumped nearly 40% each in premarket trading on Tuesday, and are on track to extend gains from a day earlier when a series of posts from "Roaring Kitty" rekindled a rally reminiscent of the meme stocks trading frenzy.】

item.title: 对华投资最多的美国公司
item.description: 美国总统拜登周二宣布对包括电动汽车、计算机芯片和医疗产品在内的一系列中国进口商品大幅提高关税，冒着在大选年与中国政府对峙的风险，以争取对其经济政策评价不高的选民。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden on Tuesday unveiled a bundle of steep tariff increases on an array of Chinese imports including electric vehicles, computer chips and medical products, risking an election-year standoff with Beijing in a bid to woo voters who give his economic policies low marks.】

item.title: 美国就自动驾驶汽车性能问题对 Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 展开调查
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周二表示，他们已对 Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 自动驾驶汽车的性能展开调查，此前有报道称其机器人轴的驾驶行为可能违反了交通安全法。【原文：U.S. auto safety regulators said Tuesday they have opened an investigation into the performance of Alphabet's Waymo self-driving vehicles after reports of its robotaxis exhibiting driving behavior that potentially violated traffic safety laws.】

item.title: 野村的目标是在 7 年内将利润增加近一倍，重点放在财富管理上
item.description: 日本最大的经纪和投资银行野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings）周二表示，随着该公司在财富管理领域的不断深入，其目标是在七年内将税前利润提高近一倍。【原文：Nomura Holdings , Japan's biggest brokerage and investment bank, said on Tuesday it aims to nearly double its pre-tax profit over seven years as it pushes deeper into wealth management.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔将发表讲话，通胀数据影响期货走势
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货变化不大，投资者在等待生产者价格数据，以了解全球最大经济体的通胀情况，同时也在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）当天晚些时候的讲话。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were little changed on Tuesday as investors waited for producer prices data for cues on inflation in the world's largest economy and ahead of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speech later in the day.】

item.title: Stellantis 和 Leapmotor 将于 9 月在欧洲 9 个国家开始销售经济型电动汽车
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）周二表示，Stellantis 将从 9 月份开始在欧洲九个国家销售来自中国合作伙伴 Leapmotor 的电动汽车（EV），以扩大其经济型汽车产品的范围。【原文：Automaker Stellantis will start to sell electric vehicles (EV) from its Chinese partner Leapmotor in nine European countries from September to expand its offer of budget cars, CEO Carlos Tavares said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中美贸易各领域现状
item.description: 美国总统拜登周二宣布对包括电动汽车、计算机芯片和医疗产品在内的一系列中国进口商品大幅提高关税，冒着在大选年与中国政府对峙的风险，以争取对其经济政策评价不高的选民。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden on Tuesday unveiled a bundle of steep tariff increases on an array of Chinese imports including electric vehicles, computer chips and medical products, risking an election-year standoff with Beijing in a bid to woo voters who give his economic policies low marks.】

item.title: 拜登大幅提高美国对数十亿美元中国芯片和汽车的关税
item.description: 美国总统拜登周二宣布对包括电动汽车、计算机芯片和医疗产品在内的一系列中国进口商品大幅提高关税，冒着在大选年与中国政府对峙的风险，以争取对其经济政策评价不高的选民。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden on Tuesday unveiled a bundle of steep tariff increases on an array of Chinese imports including electric vehicles, computer chips and medical products, risking an election-year standoff with Beijing in a bid to woo voters who give his economic policies low marks.】

item.title: 广告销售和商业服务大放异彩，中国腾讯收入增长强劲
item.description: 中国腾讯控股公司周二公布第一季度收入增长 6%，超出分析师预期，原因是商业服务和广告销售带来强劲的收入增长。【原文：China's Tencent Holdings posted a 6% rise in first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, beating analyst expectations, as business services and advertising sales deliver strong revenue growth.】

item.title: 中国房地产 "白名单 "生命线在行业阴霾中蹒跚而行
item.description: 今年早些时候，当中国地方政府开始编制住房项目贷款 "白名单 "时，陷入困境的开发商希望这将为这个仍是经济广泛复苏主要绊脚石的行业打开信贷之门。【原文：When China's local governments began compiling a "whitelist" of housing projects for loans earlier this year, troubled developers hoped it would open a spigot of credit for a sector that remains a major stumbling block to a broad economic revival.】

item.title: 英美资源集团关注分拆、炼钢煤、镍和钻石的卸载
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American）周二发布了一份战略审查报告，其中包括可能通过分拆或出售炼钢煤、镍、钻石和铂金业务来解散公司，以抵御全球最大矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的收购要约。【原文：Anglo American on Tuesday laid out a strategic review that includes a potential break-up of the company by demerging or selling its steelmaking coal, nickel, diamonds and platinum businesses as it tries to fend off a takeover bid from the world's largest miner BHP Group .】

item.title: 自 2021 年 11 月以来，降息押注令投资者 "最为看涨"--美国银行调查显示
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）周二发布的5月份基金经理月度调查显示，对降息的预期而非对盈利的乐观情绪使投资者成为自2021年11月以来 "最看涨 "的投资者。【原文：Expectations over interest rate cuts rather than earnings optimism has made investors the "most bullish" since November 2021, Bank of America's monthly fund manager survey for May showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果供应商富士康第一季度利润同比增长 72%，不及预期
item.description: 苹果供应商富士康周二公布，受计算机服务器需求强劲的推动，第一季度利润同比增长 72%，而去年同期的基数较低。【原文：Apple supplier Foxconn reported on Tuesday a 72% rise in first-quarter profit, boosted by strong demand for computer servers and coming off a low base from the period a year earlier.】

item.title: 索尼年度利润下降 7%，PS5 目标略有偏离
item.description: 日本索尼公司周二公布，受金融业务表现的影响，该公司的年度营业利润下降了 7%。【原文：Japan's Sony Group reported a 7% fall in annual operating profit on Tuesday, hit by the performance of its financial business.】

item.title: Cryptoverse：散户交易者坐等比特币反弹
item.description: 曾经推动比特币大涨的散户交易员大军现在怎么样了？【原文：What's happened to the army of retail traders who used to drive bitcoin's biggest rallies?】

item.title: 拜耳第一季度调整后利润超出市场预期
item.description: 拜耳公司周二公布，第一季度调整后盈利略有下降，但由于处方药和农业部门的业绩好于预期，超出了分析师的预测。【原文：Bayer on Tuesday reported a marginal decline in its adjusted earnings in the first quarter, but beat analysts' forecasts on better-than-expected performance at its prescription drugs and agriculture divisions.】

item.title: 大牌基金扎堆房地产债务，银行纷纷撤退
item.description: 世界上一些最大的投资者正在更深入地进军商业地产贷款领域，因为他们要从退缩的银行手中抢夺市场份额，并押注于房地产价格暴跌的终结。【原文：Some of the world's largest investors are making deeper inroads into lending to commercial property, as they snap up market share from retreating banks and bet on an end to the sharp drops in real estate prices.】

item.title: 欧元回升使美元 "大猩猩 "无法破坏欧洲央行利率前景
item.description: 得益于更乐观的经济背景，欧元暂时没有跌至与美元平价的水平，这让欧洲中央银行的决策者们松了一口气，他们可能正在努力摆脱美联储货币政策前景的影响。【原文：The euro has resisted falling to parity with the dollar for now, thanks to a rosier economic backdrop, to the relief of European Central Bank policymakers who could be struggling to detach themselves from the Federal Reserve's monetary policy outlook.】

item.title: 消息人士称，以 Blackstone 为首的财团看好印度 Haldiram 的零食业务
item.description: 两位直接知情的消息人士称，包括 Blackstone、新加坡国有基金 GIC 和阿布扎比投资局 (ADIA) 在内的一个财团正在与印度 Haldiram's 公司谈判，以获得其零食业务的多数股权，估值高达 85 亿美元。【原文：A consortium including Blackstone , Singapore state fund GIC and Abu Dhabi Investment Authority (ADIA) is in talks with India's Haldiram's for a majority stake in its snacks business at a valuation of up to $8.5 billion, two sources with direct knowledge said.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场关注美国 CPI 和历史新高
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 投资者预计必和必拓将再次提高英美资源集团的报价
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和英美资源集团（Anglo American）的投资者周二称，必和必拓集团很可能第二次提高对英美资源集团430亿美元收购要约的甜度，并可能增加现金。【原文：BHP Group is likely to sweeten its $43 billion takeover offer for Anglo American for a second time and possibly add cash, investors in both companies said on Tuesday, after the London-headquartered target rejected a higher bid.】

item.title: Uber 将收购 Delivery Hero 在台湾的 foodpanda 外卖业务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周二表示，将以 9.5 亿美元现金收购 Delivery Hero 在台湾的 foodpanda 外卖业务。【原文：Uber Technologies will acquire Delivery Hero's foodpanda delivery business in Taiwan for $950 million in cash, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市创 15 个月新高，交易商静待 CPI
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市在15个月高点附近徘徊，美元在备受期待的美国通胀数据公布前表现坚挺，而日本央行稍稍缩减了债券购买计划，日本债券受到挤压。【原文：Asian shares hovered around 15-month highs on Tuesday and the dollar was firm ahead of highly anticipated U.S. inflation data, while Japanese bonds were squeezed as the central bank pulled back a little on its bond buying programme.】

item.title: 交易员关注美国通胀数据，美元随之漂移；日元疲软成为焦点
item.description: 美元周二持稳，因为投资者在等待本周的通胀报告，该报告可能会影响美国的利率前景，而日元则在两周低点附近徘徊，激起了对干预的担忧。【原文：The dollar was steady on Tuesday as investors awaited an inflation report this week that will likely shape the U.S. rates outlook, while the yen was hovering near a two-week low, stoking intervention worries.】
